news_header: Flight departures from Finland have increased significantly this summer.
news_text: The number of flights departing from Finland and arriving in the summer has risen by over 10% compared to last year, with a slight increase in domestic flights. Overflights in Finnish airspace also saw a similar increase, particularly from Chinese airlines between July and September. Domestic flight traffic is focusing on longer distances, and Fintraffic anticipates that air traffic in Lapland will return to pre-corona levels.
